Title: A Command Line Tool For Phidgets 0/0/4 And 0/0/8
Description: Easily control Phidgets 1014 (0/0/4 or 0/0/8) using the command line in your windows. No additional programming needed.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

phidgetsCom.exe Serial Number -s Port Number -p Output -o

-s= Input the serial number on Phidgets 1014 or 1017 (If you have more than
one board attached to your pc, you need to input the serial number. Otherwise,just ignore it.)

-p= Input the output port number on Phidgets 1014(0,1,2,3) or 1017(0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7)

-o= -o=on (Value=true,Turn on) -o=off (Value=fale,Turn off)

Examples:

phidgetsCom.exe -p=0 -o=on (It means turn on output port 0)
phidgetsCom.exe -p=1 -o=off (It means turn off output port 1)
phidgetsCom.exe -s=1111 -p=2 -o=on (It means turn on port 2 on the board which s/n is 1111)
